channel.title: Timeless Truths
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast series on Living the higher life
channel.itunes:author: Akomaye Ugar
channel.description: Raising leaders of sort, born from the depth of God's word and operating on the power of redemption

item.title: 5 Keys for Pressing In.
item.itunes:author: Akomaye Ugar
item.itunes:subtitle: Taking over uncharted territories
item.itunes:summary: 5 things you need to do in order to press in.

item.title: School of Mentorship - April 2010
item.itunes:author: Akomaye Ugar
item.itunes:subtitle: A mentorship, career and personal development session
item.itunes:summary: School of mentorship is a quaterly organized by Akomaye Ugar. The event covers areas ranging from career, relationship, finance and personal development. It features experts and professionals from different sectors sharing time tested truths and knowledge.
item.itunes:keywords: Akomaye, Ugar, Christianity, Career, Mentorship, Personal Development, Calabar, Nigeria
